Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Enhanced real property tax exemption for veterans
Summary: Provides an enhanced real property tax exemption for veterans, regardless of income.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing an enhanced exemption for veterans regardless of income
